Sri Ananth Hegde Ashisara bụ onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi si Uttara Kannada District, Karnataka, India na onyeisi oche, Karnataka Biodiversity Board, Gọọmenti Karnataka.

Maazị Ashisara bụkwa onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Western Ghats Task Force (WGTF) ma na-etinye aka na nchedo gburugburu ebe obibi, ọkachasị Western Ghats, ebe ihe nketa ụwa. Ọ bụkwa onye nhazi nke Vriksh Raksha Andolan, otu ndị si Malenadu raara onwe ha nye ichebe gburugburu ebe obibi.
Ọ na-etinye aka na mmegharị ndị mmadụ megide ọrụ igwu ala na gburugburu ugwu Ambaragudda nke Western Ghats nke dị na Shimoga District, Karnataka.

O tinyela mgbalị iji nweta mkpado arboreal na osisi ochie 10 nke Karnataka, nke gụnyere Big Banyan osisi, Bangalore (400 afọ), Adansonia digitata - Malvaceae, Bijapur Taluk (600 afọ), "Pilali" osisi Ficus micro corpus,  Banavasi, Uttara Kannada wdg. O gosipụtara nchegbu banyere nchekwa nke ike nuklia n'ihi mmebi nke ọrụ ike nuklia na Japan tsunami (2010).
